summary: "12 Years a Slave" is a 2013 movie about Solomon Northup, a free African American man who was kidnapped and sold into slavery in 1841. Based on his real-life memoir, the film shows his 12 years of hardship on Louisiana plantations before being freed. Directed by Steve McQueen, it stars Chiwetel Ejiofor as Solomon. Shot in New Orleans, the movie won many awards, including Best Picture at the Oscars, and is now considered one of the best films of all time. It's also preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry for its importance.
title: 12 Years a Slave (film)
